channel.title: Features on Container Registry
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Container Registry

item.title: What's new in Harbor 2.6
item.description: Harbor 2.6 is about to land in the next days containing some long-awaited functionalities and two important deprecations. With over 150 enhancements and bug fixes, this release further improves stability and reliability. The deprecation hits Notary and ChartMuseum, which was used in Harbor to store Helm Chart Repositories.

item.title: Harbor Release 2.2.0
item.description: Harbor 2.2.0 was just released and comes with some very interesting features. This post walks you through the newly added features and changes explaining the capabilities. Since the last release of v2.1.0 in September 2020, eleven contributors made 41 changes and resolved 189 issues.
